title: Trump's World Liberty Financial Reveals Major Foreign Crypto Investments
summary: Trump's cryptocurrency firm, World Liberty Financial, made $550 million through secret payments from foreign entities, including a $2 billion investment from an Abu Dhabi state-backed firm and $75 million from Chinese investor Justin Sun, raising significant conflict of interest concerns.
description: An investigation revealed that Trump's cryptocurrency firm, World Liberty Financial, engaged in questionable foreign investment practices. The company received $2 billion from an Abu Dhabi state-backed firm and $75 million from Chinese investor Justin Sun, raising significant conflict of interest concerns about potential policy influence.
